0.text: Active: Olaf throws an axe to the target location that deals physical damage to enemies it passes through and  slows them for 1.5 − 2.5 (based on distance traveled) seconds. Enemy  champions hit are also inflicted with  20% armor reduction for 4 seconds.

1.text: Olaf grants  ghosting to  monsters that are hit or nearby when Undertow is cast for 6 seconds.
1.html: Olaf grants ghosting to monsters that are hit or nearby when Undertow is cast for 6 seconds.
markedPassages: ghosting
monsters

2.text: The axe remains in place for a duration equal to Undertow's cooldown, briefly granting  sight of its surroundings. Olaf can pick up the axe to reduce Undertow's  total cooldown to 2.5 seconds, which  resets the cooldown if that has already elapsed.
2.html: The axe remains in place for a duration equal to Undertow's cooldown, briefly granting sight of its surroundings. Olaf can pick up the axe to reduce Undertow's  total cooldown to 2.5 seconds, which  resets the cooldown if that has already elapsed.
markedPassages: sight
total cooldown
resets

3.text: Undertow will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

0.html: Passive: Olaf gains  bonus armor and  bonus magic resistance.

bonus magic resistance

1.text: Active: Olaf becomes enraged for 3 seconds,  cleansing himself of all  crowd control and becoming  immune to them, as well as gaining  bonus attack damage and 10% increased size. For the first second of Ragnarok, he also gains  bonus movement speed while moving towards  visible enemy  champions within 2000 units.
1.html: Active: Olaf becomes enraged for 3 seconds, cleansing himself of all crowd control and becoming immune to them, as well as gaining  bonus attack damage and 10% increased size. For the first second of Ragnarok, he also gains  bonus movement speed while moving towards visible enemy champions within 2000 units.

crowd control
immune to them
bonus attack damage
bonus movement speed
visible
champions

2.text: Ragnarok's duration is increased by and up to 2.5 seconds for each basic attack  on-hit or cast of  Reckless Swing against an enemy  champion.

Active: Olaf becomes enraged for 3 seconds,  cleansing himself of all  crowd control and becoming  immune to them, as well as gaining  bonus attack damage and 10% increased size. For the first second of Ragnarok, he also gains  bonus movement speed while moving towards  visible enemy  champions within 2000 units.

0.concerningText: Passive: Olaf gains  bonus armor and  bonus magic resistance.

st_flatStats1.concerningText: Active: Olaf throws an axe to the target location that deals physical damage to enemies it passes through and  slows them for 1.5 − 2.5 (based on distance traveled) seconds. Enemy  champions hit are also inflicted with  20% armor reduction for 4 seconds.

st_flatStats0.concerningText: Active: Olaf gains  bonus attack speed for 4 seconds and a  shield for 2.5 seconds with an amount that is capped at 70% missing health.

st_flatStats1.concerningText: Active: Olaf gains  bonus attack speed for 4 seconds and a  shield for 2.5 seconds with an amount that is capped at 70% missing health.

st_flatStats0.concerningText: Passive: Olaf gains  bonus armor and  bonus magic resistance.
